body: Hey, atleast he is keeping his word of helping her make advances, there’s like three possible endings for this now: the guy’s intention was truly to help them get together, they do and have a healthy sex life because of how he trained her (most wholesome but less likely to happen). The kid finds out and moves on from her, she ends up heartbroken and using the senior as a sexual comfort to forget her friend. Or finally, he finds out and decides to be a total crybaby bitch, while the girl is already too sex-addicted to even care (most disgusting and also most likely to happen, because of how shitty this plot is even for an ntr)

@zombieadd. Prophet of Truth.

Stop dreaming guys, you know how NTR works by now. By that I mean, STOP HOPING. This is the kind of story where she will fall to lust completely... OK maybe there is a slight chance that it would have a twist ending but I doubt it and it is not for no reason; just read the last page: she says "IT FEELS SO GOOD", it's a declaration that it's over, the childhood friend (CF) didn't even hold her hand at all roflmao and this is already following the footsteps of stories like "Toshoshitsu no Kanojo" by Ame Arare. Not only that, this chapter confirms it that there is nothing striking between FMC and CF. Kami Nana said it right, unrealistic NTR and that's what NTR is all about. As much as I want every love story to be sweet, happy, wholesome, vanilla, hahaha face it, it won't happen here. Heck, if you read the title, it even confirms TOTAL NTR (STOLEN). Now look forward to a debauchery of degeneracy/depravity/mind break/chad wins/etc finale.  So part 4 better have some long hot sex scenes.

Damn more props to scan guy for another fast one in a row. That said the end is becoming more and more obvious that she won't like mc's virgin dick and I hope the next one just ends it already. The set up was atrocious but at least 2 and 3 gave us decent lewds. It's to the point where 2 and 3 would be the same with their set up redacted and it not even being ntr.

The problem with ntr isn't really the thing itself. If you like, you like and fuck it no one has anything to do with it. But it's undeniable that the authors are mostly problematic for making a 1 or 2 chapters long work have 4, 5 or sometimes even more when it's completly unecessary and even annoying at times. This one could have ended at chapter 2 or maybe even 1 if you cut down 2/3 of the context since all that we needed was :"she's my CF i like her she likes me but we're stagnant. Oh here comes senpai, hey senpai".
btw, reason that I said this cause this is one of the most boring NTR I've ever read

In my opinion it's cringy and was hoping for something new ofc in every NTR we get. The girl is damn hot (as always in a NTR), but please dont drag the story for too long. Us that will be expecting with an ending where she'll be surrendering to the senpai after she gets creampied and that senpai says "we're out of condoms" beforehand. And guess what-- Minato will get cucked after seeing the both of them in a sms or just with his own eyes.

This is so boring and predictable, and before anyone says that vanilla is as well, we know but at least they don't drag the story on for 3-4 chapters for it to end the same way an 1 chapter story would.
